entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
